publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8056 Rob Gibson: GREAN Award—That the Parliament congratulates the Golspie Recycling and Environmental Action Network (GREAN) on winning the Scottish Social Enterprise of the Year 2011 award; considers that this award is well merited and that, in running an exemplary recycling business, GREAN provides important and transforming work to the community of east Sutherland as well as to the wider Highlands; believes that GREAN makes an important contribution to both Highland and national recycling targets and that the jobs that it offers for people in the community are a positive example to others; considers this to be a vital social enterprise and calls for continued grant aid to support it, and wishes the management and workers continued success and the best for the future.

S3M-8056 GREAN Award (lodged on 2 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Stone*, Stewart Stevenson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Willie Coffey*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-8056 Rob Gibson: GREAN Award—That the Parliament congratulates the Golspie Recycling and Environmental Action Network (GREAN) on winning the Scottish Social Enterprise of the Year 2011 award; considers that this award is well merited and that, in running an exemplary recycling business, GREAN provides important and transforming work to the community of east Sutherland as well as to the wider Highlands; believes that GREAN makes an important contribution to both Highland and national recycling targets and that the jobs that it offers for people in the community are a positive example to others; considers this to be a vital social enterprise and calls for continued grant aid to support it, and wishes the management and workers continued success and the best for the future. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Jamie Stone, Stewart Stevenson, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Brian Adam, Willie Coffey, Gil Paterson, Maureen Watt*

Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Jamie Stone, Stewart Stevenson, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Robin Harper, Brian Adam, Willie Coffey, Gil Paterson, Maureen Watt
